Using Tasks

The Task component allows the creation of Task lists and work assignments in this application. Team members can easily see who should do what tasks, when tasks should be done, see current task status, estimate the time required for a task, record the time spent, and compare estimated to actual times.

Other powerful features of the Task component include:

  • Linking tasks to files and the change requests with which they are associated

  • Showing the relationship between a task and its subtasks with the tree format

  • Sorting, grouping, and querying tasks with the list format

You can use the Task component independently or in conjunction with Microsoft Project.

Note: Only organizations that have licensed the Enterprise Advantage version of this application have access to the Task component.
